title: Horror Film Fans Beware: 'It Follows' Isn't The Fun Kind Of Scare
teaser: The film is about a teenage girl who sleeps with a boy and is suddenly under a curse. Critic David Edelstein says he didn't enjoy feeling "sick with dread," but the ending is unexpectedly moving.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
